==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|ぶん|しょ|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふんしょ'}} compound {{m|ltc|文書|tr=*miən *shiu}}. Compare modern {{cog|zh|文書|tr=wénshū}}.

The [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']] reading, so likely a later borrowing. Now the most common reading for this term.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ぶんしょ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ぶんしょ}}

# a [[document]], a written [[record]]
#: {{ja-usex|文書でお問い合わせください。|^ぶんしょ で おといあわせ ください。|Please contact us '''in writing'''.}}
#: {{ja-usex|物語を丸ごと文書に書き留めた。|^ものがたり を まるごと ぶんしょ に かきとめた。|She wrote down the whole story. / She got the whole story down '''on paper'''.}}
# a [[letter]], an [[epistle]]
#: {{ja-usex|文書を頻繁に交わしていた。|^ぶんしょ を ひんぱん に かわして いた。|They frequently exchanged '''letters'''.}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|writing}} {{l|ja|文章}}
* {{sense|letter, epistle}} {{l|ja|手紙}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|もん|しょ|k2=じょ|yomi=on}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふんしょ'}} compound {{m|ltc|文書|tr=*miən *shiu}}, with [[rendaku]] for the {{ja-l|書}} character. {{rendaku2|sort=もんじょ|sho|jo}} Compare modern {{cog|zh|文書|tr=wénshū}}.

The [[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] reading, so likely the initial borrowing. Less common reading in modern {{etyl|ja|-}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=goon|もんじょ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もんじょ}}

# a [[document]]
# (in palaeography) a written text between two parties

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-l|古文書|こもんじょ|komonjo}}: an [[ancient]] [[document]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|もん|ぞ|yomi=irreg}}
Archaic alteration of ''monjo'' above.

====Pronunciation====
* Irregular
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[mõ̞nzo̞]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もんぞ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=もんぞ|archaic}} a [[document]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=もんぞ|archaic}} (in palaeography) a written text between two parties

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|ふみ|かき|k2=がき|yomi=kun}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ふみがき|文|tr1=fumi|t1=writing; a letter, an epistle|書|tr2=kaki|t2=writing|pos2=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||stem or continuative form}} of verb {{ja-l|書く}} ''kaku'', “to write”}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref> {{rendaku2|sort=ふみがき|kaki|gaki}}

====Pronunciation====
* {{l|ja|sc=Latn|訓読み|Kun'yomi}}
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ɸɯᵝmiŋa̠ki]}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ふみがき}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ふみがき|archaic}} the act of [[writing]] of a [[letter]] or [[correspondence]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=ふみがき|archaic}} the [[writing]] in a [[letter]] or [[correspondence]], especially the [[style]] or [[appearance]]
#* {{RQ:Genji Monogatari}} (text [http://etext.lib.virginia.edu/japanese/genji/Mur29GO.html#t17 here]):
#*: {{lang|ja|古代なる御'''文書き'''なれど}}
#*:: {{lang|ja|こだいなるおおむ'''ふみがき'''なれど}}
#*:: ''Kodai naru ōmu-'''fumigaki''' naredo''
#*::: The '''writing''' is old-fashioned, but...
